name: Poachy Woachy
description:
The game is a simple 2D platformer that constantly scrolls to the right where the player must either roll under or jump over obstacles, cliffs, and traps to avoid being caught by Walter the poacher. The player controls Bryan, the Red Panda. Collect as many bamboo pieces as you can to increase your score! There are currently two levels.

Credits:

Connor Bugni - project manager/artist

Emily Chau - artist

Blake Hennigan - game designer

Brendan Hutchins - programmer
